Transportation Advisory Services

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row use_custom_gutter=”on” gutter_width=”1″ disabled_on=”on|off|off” module_class=” et_pb_row_fullwidth” _builder_version=”3.25″ width=”100%” width_tablet=”100%” width_phone=”” width_last_edited=”on|desktop” max_width=”100%” max_width_tablet=”100%” max_width_phone=”” max_width_last_edited=”on|desktop” make_fullwidth=”on” locked=”off”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”3.29.3″ text_font=”Amethysta|700||on|||||” text_text_color=”rgba(255,255,255,0.2)” text_font_size=”10vw” text_line_height=”1em” quote_font=”||||||||” header_font=”||||||||” custom_margin=”||-0.4em|” custom_padding=”|||” filter_blur=”7px” animation_style=”slide” animation_direction=”right” animation_duration=”10000ms” animation_intensity_slide=”10%” animation_starting_opacity=”40%” animation_speed_curve=”linear”]

TRANSPORTATION

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”3.29.2″ custom_padding=”||28px|||” collapsed=”on”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”3.29.3″][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”3.29.2″][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.6.5″ text_font=”Amethysta|700|||||||” text_text_color=”#32a8cc” text_font_size=”30px” text_orientation=”center”]

TRANSPORTATION ADVISORY SERVICES

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.6.5″]

We provide advisory services for the transportation industry. Our team of experts have solid international experience producing due diligence, master plans, transport models, feasibility studies, cost-benefit analysis, safety studies, resilience plans, asset management plans, transport management studies, and any information that infrastructure operators, planners and investors need to maximise their returns.

We can provide expert insights at any stage of the infrastructure development, from concept to commissioning, that will help them make the right decisions. We have a special focus on intelligent mobility and digital transformation of infrastructure systems, and we can advise our clients on the latest technology available

Details of our full capability statements can be downloaded on the following LINK

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.0.5″][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.0.5″][et_pb_image src=”https://ewlinternational.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/10/EWL-35.jpg” title_text=”EWL-35″ _builder_version=”4.6.5″][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”3.29.2″ custom_padding=”||28px|||” locked=”off” collapsed=”off”][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_2,1_2″ _builder_version=”3.29.3″][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”3.29.2″][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.6.5″ text_font=”Amethysta|700|||||||” text_text_color=”#32a8cc” text_font_size=”25px” text_orientation=”center”]

STRATEGIC ADVICE

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.6.5″ _module_preset=”default”]

EWL offer our clients informed strategic advice. We believe that our specialist railway team, in particular our high-speed rail experience, gained over the past 50-years gives us the ability to make in-depth, objective and trusted judgements. We continue to advise governments and the rail industry throughout the world on their strategic rail investments.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”3.29.2″][et_pb_image src=”https://ewlinternational.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/10/EWL-39.jpg” title_text=”EWL-39″ _builder_version=”4.6.5″ _module_preset=”default”][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.6.5″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.6.5″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_divider color=”#e6e6e6″ divider_style=”dotted” _builder_version=”4.6.5″ _module_preset=”default”][/et_pb_divider][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_2,1_2″ _builder_version=”3.29.3″][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.6.5″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_image src=”https://ewlinternational.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/10/EWL-41.jpg” title_text=”EWL-41″ _builder_version=”4.6.5″ _module_preset=”default”][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”3.29.2″][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.6.5″ text_font=”Amethysta|700|||||||” text_text_color=”#32a8cc” text_font_size=”25px” text_orientation=”center”]

TRANSPORTATION APPRAISALS, BUSINESS CASES AND FUNDING OPTIONS

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.6.5″ _module_preset=”default”]

Securing the funding and investment for transport solutions require to demonstrate value for money and financial sustainability. For public and private sector projects, value for money is obtained by investing in measures which best meet social, economic and technical requirements which are specific to that project. We provide the strategies, analysis of current problems and opportunities, by demonstrating a fit with policy aims, including risk identification.

Our team includes experts in stakeholder engagement; transport planning, modelling and forecasting; economic, safety, environmental and financial analysis; scheme design technical assessments, costing; and business case preparation.

EWL have been advising Clients and have expertise to help clients secure funding and approvals for a large number of schemes and programmes including Local Sustainable Transport Fund applications, High Speed Rail, National commuter rail networks, major transport schemes, and Metro-link projects.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.6.5″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.6.5″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_divider color=”#e6e6e6″ divider_style=”dotted” _builder_version=”4.6.5″ _module_preset=”default”][/et_pb_divider][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_2,1_2″ _builder_version=”3.29.3″][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”3.29.2″][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.6.5″ text_font=”Amethysta|700|||||||” text_text_color=”#32a8cc” text_font_size=”25px” text_orientation=”center”]

PUBLIC TRANSPORT DEVELOPMENT STRATEGIES AND FEASIBILITY SOLUTIONS

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.6.5″ _module_preset=”default”]

Our transport planning and engineering skills are combined on all of our projects to develop evidence based public and private transport development strategies; balancing the requirements of the corridors served, policy goals and costs.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”3.29.2″][et_pb_image src=”https://ewlinternational.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/10/EWL-42.jpg” title_text=”EWL-42″ _builder_version=”4.6.5″ _module_preset=”default”][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.6.5″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.6.5″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_divider color=”#e6e6e6″ divider_style=”dotted” _builder_version=”4.6.5″ _module_preset=”default”][/et_pb_divider][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_2,1_2″ _builder_version=”3.29.3″][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.6.5″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_image src=”https://ewlinternational.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/10/EWL-43.jpg” title_text=”EWL-43″ _builder_version=”4.6.5″ _module_preset=”default”][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”3.29.2″][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.6.5″ text_font=”Amethysta|700|||||||” text_text_color=”#32a8cc” text_font_size=”25px” text_orientation=”center”]

TRANSPORTATION PLANNING

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.6.5″ _module_preset=”default”]

We work with country governments, local authorities, regions, districts, cities and to support their aspirations to develop excellent transport networks in order to accommodate the world’s growing populations, support economic vitality and most importantly protect the environment.

Our approaches include stakeholder and public consultation; transport modelling and analysis; capacity analysis, and engineering feasibility, design and costs.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.6.5″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.6.5″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_divider color=”#e6e6e6″ divider_style=”dotted” _builder_version=”4.6.5″ _module_preset=”default”][/et_pb_divider][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_2,1_2″ _builder_version=”3.29.3″][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”3.29.2″][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.6.5″ text_font=”Amethysta|700|||||||” text_text_color=”#32a8cc” text_font_size=”25px” text_orientation=”center”]

RAIL SERVICE PLANNING

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.6.5″ _module_preset=”default”]

Planning a rail service or developing a timetable is fundamental to the preliminary design. We have worked on the development of the French TGV timetable and new line and station studies and franchise bids for train operating companies and also Network Rail.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”3.29.2″][et_pb_image src=”https://ewlinternational.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/10/EWL-44.jpg” title_text=”EWL-44″ _builder_version=”4.6.5″ _module_preset=”default”][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.6.5″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.6.5″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_divider color=”#e6e6e6″ divider_style=”dotted” _builder_version=”4.6.5″ _module_preset=”default”][/et_pb_divider][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_2,1_2″ _builder_version=”3.29.3″][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.6.5″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_image src=”https://ewlinternational.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/10/EWL-45.jpg” title_text=”EWL-45″ _builder_version=”4.6.5″ _module_preset=”default”][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”3.29.2″][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.6.5″ text_font=”Amethysta|700|||||||” text_text_color=”#32a8cc” text_font_size=”25px” text_orientation=”center”]

SCHEME DEVELOPMENT PLANNING AND TRAFFIC ENGINEERING

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.6.5″ _module_preset=”default”]

Optimal traffic and transport engineering designs improve the efficiency and accessibility of our towns and new developments; and can be essential in securing planning approval. We design transport solutions to meet the needs of all cars, service vehicles, public transport, pedestrians and cyclists.

Our services include estimating trip generation of new developments, junction analysis and design, parking and pick-up/drop-off designs, internal circulation layout, signing strategies and temporary traffic management advice.

Our clients include governments, councils and developers.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.6.5″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.6.5″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_divider color=”#e6e6e6″ divider_style=”dotted” _builder_version=”4.6.5″ _module_preset=”default”][/et_pb_divider][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_2,1_2″ _builder_version=”3.29.3″][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”3.29.2″][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.6.5″ text_font=”Amethysta|700|||||||” text_text_color=”#32a8cc” text_font_size=”25px” text_orientation=”center”]

BUILT ASSET OPTIMISATION

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.6.5″ _module_preset=”default”]

Improving the profitability of a transport business relies on understanding what customers need and how much they are willing to pay; and understanding the demand, cost and revenue implications of an investment.

EWL offer integrated teams with expertise including customer satisfaction surveys, willingness to pay studies, financial analysis, stakeholder engagement, scheme design and cost estimation, modelling and forecasting, risk analysis and business case development.

Our clients include governments, National rail and highway agencies, train operators, toll road concessionaires, and international institutions.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”3.29.2″][et_pb_image src=”https://ewlinternational.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/10/EWL-46.jpg” title_text=”EWL-46″ _builder_version=”4.6.5″ _module_preset=”default”][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.6.5″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.6.5″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_divider color=”#e6e6e6″ divider_style=”dotted” _builder_version=”4.6.5″ _module_preset=”default”][/et_pb_divider][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_2,1_2″ _builder_version=”3.29.3″][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.6.5″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_image src=”https://ewlinternational.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/10/EWL-50.jpg” title_text=”EWL-50″ _builder_version=”4.6.5″ _module_preset=”default”][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”3.29.2″][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.6.5″ text_font=”Amethysta|700|||||||” text_text_color=”#32a8cc” text_font_size=”25px” text_orientation=”center”]

TRANSPORT RESEARCH & SURVEYS

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.6.5″ _module_preset=”default”]

Understanding travel patterns, preferences and behaviour helps transport providers to better provide for transport demand, increase market share and revenues, and meet customer expectations of quality of service.

Our teams have expertise in household and traveller surveys, traffic and passenger count design and analysis, travel time surveys, customer satisfaction surveys, attitudinal studies, and willingness to pay research (including Stated and Revealed Preference).

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.6.5″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.6.5″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_divider color=”#e6e6e6″ divider_style=”dotted” _builder_version=”4.6.5″ _module_preset=”default”][/et_pb_divider][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_2,1_2″ _builder_version=”3.29.3″][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”3.29.2″][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.6.5″ text_font=”Amethysta|700|||||||” text_text_color=”#32a8cc” text_font_size=”25px” text_orientation=”center”]

FORECASTING TRANSPORT DEMAND AGAINST CAPACITY MODELLING

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.6.5″ _module_preset=”default”]

Forecasts of transport demand can be useful for host of applications including developing transport strategies to serve growing populations; tackling congested roads, stations and public transport services; optimising public transport; improving revenues from transport provision; securing financing and funding; designing new infrastructure; assessing and tackling local air quality and noise problems; and reducing the carbon foot-print.

We advise on proportionate approaches and employ a range of modelling techniques including highway and public transport modelling, micro-simulation, variable demand models, pedestrian simulation, and econometric analysis.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”3.29.2″][et_pb_image src=”https://ewlinternational.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/10/EWL-47.jpg” title_text=”EWL-47″ _builder_version=”4.6.5″ _module_preset=”default”][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.6.5″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.6.5″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_divider color=”#e6e6e6″ divider_style=”dotted” _builder_version=”4.6.5″ _module_preset=”default”][/et_pb_divider][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_2,1_2″ _builder_version=”3.29.3″][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.6.5″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_image src=”https://ewlinternational.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/10/EWL-18-1.jpg” title_text=”EWL-18″ _builder_version=”4.6.5″ _module_preset=”default”][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”3.29.2″][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.6.5″ text_font=”Amethysta|700|||||||” text_text_color=”#32a8cc” text_font_size=”25px” text_orientation=”center”]

ENGINEERING & ENVIRONMENT

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.6.5″ _module_preset=”default”]

We deliver engineering and environmental expertise for rail schemes that are both feasible and affordable. We have advised a funding partner of Rail Link Engineering Ltd, the project management and engineering team which delivered HS1 on time and within budget. As a member of this consortium we managed the infrastructure design and construction and oversaw the construction of tunnels, bridges and viaducts, rail track and overhead catenary, in-cab signalling, power supplies and state-of-the-art telecommunication systems. Once built, we also managed the detailed programme of testing and commissioning the line.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.6.5″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.6.5″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_divider color=”#e6e6e6″ divider_style=”dotted” _builder_version=”4.6.5″ _module_preset=”default”][/et_pb_divider][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_2,1_2″ _builder_version=”3.29.3″][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”3.29.2″][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.6.5″ text_font=”Amethysta|700|||||||” text_text_color=”#32a8cc” text_font_size=”25px” text_orientation=”center”]

FREIGHT & LOGISTICS

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.6.5″ _module_preset=”default”]

Freight services and logistics are essential to economic wellbeing. We assist client to answer questions such as:

  • What freight and logistics infrastructure are required?
  • How to manage the interaction of goods and passenger traffic?
  • How to reduce the environmental impact of transport?
  • What are the financial, social and environmental impacts of potential investments?

Our services include logistic surveys, freight modelling and forecasting, socio-economic and environmental impact appraisals, operational optimisation, and freight infrastructure feasibility studies.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”3.29.2″][et_pb_image src=”https://ewlinternational.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/10/EWL-49.jpg” title_text=”EWL-49″ _builder_version=”4.6.5″ _module_preset=”default”][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ admin_label=”footer-ewl(cabecera)” _builder_version=”4.6.5″ bottom_divider_style=”asymmetric2″ bottom_divider_color=”#515553″ global_module=”740″ locked=”off” collapsed=”off”][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ admin_label=”footer-ewl” _builder_version=”3.29.3″ background_color=”#515553″ min_height=”470px” custom_padding=”27px|||||” global_module=”730″ locked=”off” collapsed=”on”][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_4,1_4,1_4,1_4″ _builder_version=”4.6.5″ custom_padding=”|||”][et_pb_column type=”1_4″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_image src=”https://ewlinternational.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/10/EWL-Logo-3-copia.png” title_text=”EWL Logo 3 copia” _builder_version=”4.6.5″ _module_preset=”default”][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_4″ _builder_version=”3.29.3″][et_pb_blurb title=”UK” _builder_version=”4.6.5″ header_font=”Amethysta|700||on|||||” header_text_align=”center” header_text_color=”#ffffff” header_font_size=”23px” body_font=”Open Sans||||||||” body_text_align=”center” body_text_color=”#a5a5a5″ body_font_size=”17px” body_line_height=”1.3em”]

Rzeszow
35-103, Poland

[/et_pb_blurb][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.6.5″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.6.5″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.6.5″ _module_preset=”default” text_font_size=”20px” link_font=”Amethysta||||||||” link_text_color=”#32a8cc” link_font_size=”23px”]

info@ewlinternational.co.uk

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.6.5″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.6.5″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.6.5″ _module_preset=”default” text_text_color=”#ffffff” text_font_size=”17px”]
